function.name: imageViewer_show
function.description: This function is used to display content from one SmartThings device on another video_capable SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the source device is located.

room.description: The room where the source device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the source device to display its content.

consumerLocation.description: The location where the consumer device is located.

consumerDevice.description: The name or type of the consumer device to display the content on.
